participant_1.background:
I work at the gas station as a part time job.
My hobbies include rock collecting and making macaroni art.
My lifes goal is to be the worlds foremost encyclopedia salesman.
I once saw peyton manning at the grocery store.
I am a traveling encyclopedia salesman.

participant_2.background:
I am an old woman who lives on a social security check.
I babysit for the woman who lives next door.
I only take the bus.
My favorite color is yellow.
I often do not have the money to pay my utility bills.

content.text: Hi there! My name is [user 1's name].
Hi there! My name is [user 2's name].
I'm a traveling encyclopedia salesman. I've been all over the country and I've seen a lot of interesting things.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been outside of my state, but I'd love to travel someday.
You should! It's a great way to learn about different cultures and meet new people.
I know, I know. I'm just not sure how I'd afford it.
There are a lot of ways to travel on a budget. You could camp, stay in hostels, or even hitchhike.
I don't know about hitchhiking, but camping and hostels sound like fun.
They are! And they're a great way to meet people and see new places.
I'll definitely keep that in mind.
I'm glad! Now, what do you do for a living?
I'm a retired schoolteacher. I used to teach kindergarten, but now I'm just enjoying my retirement.
That's great! I'm sure you've had a lot of fun in retirement.
I have! I've been spending a lot of time with my grandchildren, and I've also been doing a lot of traveling.
That's awesome! I'm sure your grandchildren love spending time with you.
They do! They're always begging me to come over and play with them.
I bet you're a great grandma.
I try!
I'm sure your grandchildren are lucky to have you.
Thank you! I'm lucky to have them too.
